0.1.name: wordpress/retina
0.1.description: An elegant, versatile, nice and simple blog theme featuring custom background, custom header, custom menu, flexible header, featured images, sticky post, fixed-width, theme options, widget-ready, threaded comments and translation ready. You can easily use your own Logo, Text and Background. The Theme can work for various different niches.
